snippet.title: Little Alchemist Android Trailer
snippet.description:
Little Alchemist is an addictive combination of spell crafting and strategic combat. Save Little Town by collecting spells and discovering tons of cute and clever combos to overpower your enemies!

Play Little Alchemist for free @ https://www.kongregate.com/pages/little-alchemist-on-mobile

• Free-to-play RPG
• Explore Little Town and become a Master Alchemist
• Use clever spell combinations to defeat evil villains
• Over 300 spells to collect
• Over 350 powerful spell combinations
• Battle your friends and rivals in the Arena
• Unlock the event portal and earn new spells
• Customize your spell book and your avatar
• Tons of spell types: Super heroes, Wizards, Vampires, Zombies, Pirates, Monsters, Rainbows, Unicorns, Knights, Dragons, and many more!

See what our users have to say about Little Alchemist:

"I combined rainbow with rainbow and made a double rainbow spell! WHAT DOES IT MEAN?! Can't wait to discover more funny spell combos"

"I have a fever and the only cure is more Little Alchemist. Need more "

"AWESOME graphics and gameplay. Sooo addicted! Can play for a few mins or hours!"

Don't forget to SUBSCRIBE ► http://kon.gg/2GYLmTu

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Kongregate
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/kongregate

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/LittleAlchemistGame
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/AlchemistLittle
